title: Providing a block of land from Narahenpita area to the Sri Lanka Air Force to construct a hospital
decision_details: - A land lot with an extent of 7 acres and 39.9 perches has been vested with the Urban Development Authority to carry out urban development projects. The Sri Lanka Air Force has requested the Urban Development Authority to provide them a land lot in extent of 03 acres of the said land to construct a hospital. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as the Minister of Urban Development and Housing, to vest a land lot of 03 acres from the said land with the Sri Lanka Air Force, as a free grant, was approved by the Cabinet.
